info.title: TalentLMS API
info.description: Cloud, lean and complete LMS with an emphasis on usability and easy course creation

post.description: Logout a user from the TalentLMS domain

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to logout

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: The URL to redirect the user after logout (optional)

redirect_url.description: The URL to redirect the user for logout

logout_redirect.description: URL to redirect the user when they log out (optional)

user_id.description: ID of the logged in user
